title: OBJ Has Matured, NBA Finals Preview (Lakers/Bucks) and Raiders Rumors
itunes:title: OBJ Has Matured, NBA Finals Preview (Lakers/Bucks) and Raiders Rumors
description:
Colin explains why Odell Beckham Jr. is being mature this season, why he is looking forward to Lakers-Bucks tonight and why people shouldn’t want parity in the NBA. He also discusses the Derrick Carr-Jon Gruden rumors and why you should be careful when you replace someone. Guests include Reggie Bush, Greg Cosell, Ric Bucher, and TJ Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
